Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and interests. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer takes into account both the product's worth to you and my aim to maximize its value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both of us. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to ask. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
